refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: To query the attributes of an audio output applications initialize the index field and zero out the reserved array of a &v4l2-audioout; and call the VIDIOC_G_AUDOUT ioctl with a pointer to this structure. Drivers fill the rest of the structure or return an &EINVAL; when the index is out of bounds. To enumerate all audio outputs applications shall begin at index zero, incrementing by one until the driver returns EINVAL.
Note connectors on a TV card to loop back the received audio signal to a sound card are not audio outputs in this sense.
